title: Soudal Quick-Step Searching for Its Snarl Ahead of Tour of Flanders
content:
The classics 'Wolf Pack' was out of the running at both E3 Saxo Classic and Gent-Wevelgem. Can it turn things around for De Ronde?

Read the full article at Soudal Quick-Step Searching for Its Snarl Ahead of Tour of Flanders on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
